info.name: eOCS-T2662-Update Note field in Incident Brick

exec: //We are checking here if we logged in successfully and the response is as expected
//If we get 403 status code, it means we do not have default auth profile
console.log("You should set Default Authorization Profile of user first")
//If we get 400 status code, it means you should logout first

request.description: Please do not delete "system" variable. Just update it with the system you are testing in EOCS-T2662-Update Note field in Incident Brick folder ->Variables tab like in the picture. With this request, we are logging. I**n this request, I used BAO user but you can change it in Body tab as in the picture.** If you get 403 status code, you should select default auth profile for special user you are using. If you get 400 status code, you should first logout. Just send Extra Step -Logout from System request.

request.description:
With this request, we are updating Note field in Incident Brick.

PUT request uses 2 IDs: one Incident ID and another one UIBrickdata but you have to look up in devtools in the browser and update IncidentId. Most probably, ubrickid should be same but it would be better, if you check it.

You can first set a note via browser in Incident and find this request in devtools and copy the request body from there. Then you can paste it in Body tab of this request.

With this request I only intended to change Note field with.

In this request in Body tab, you can change the following as you wish.

"note": "BAO new note from Postman"
This request for logging out. You should see 200 OK status code.
